song_name: Every Little Thing She Does Is Magic
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Every Little Thing She Does Is Magic is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Every Little Thing She Does Is Magic has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Major,  and D Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
